description: Base terrain definitions for Travel-Minimal. Movement costs from Travel-System.md.

terrains.name: Plains
terrains.description: Open grassland. Slightly slower than roads.

terrains.name: Mountains
terrains.description: Steep mountain terrain. Very slow, foot only.

terrains.name: Swamp
terrains.description: Boggy wetland. Difficult terrain, foot only.

terrains.name: Desert
terrains.description: Arid sandy terrain. Heat and sand slow travel.

terrains.name: Water
terrains.description: Deep water. Requires a boat to cross.
